data.message:
I am not ready to Leave, it's too scary to Die,
I will have to be carried inside a cemetery and buried Alive, 
Am i coming or going? I can barely Decide , 
i took 5 pills, did nine kills, you dare me to Drive, 
i go to wrestlemania and scream
"Ric flair should die", 
I am as clean as Vaseline on a medium sized,
Penis, You do know what i really Mean Is, 
You're a scum bag and imma motherfuckin Genius, 
Call me Newton, Einstein,  Ferb or Phineas,
I am a crazy Martian who lives on Venus, 
Aiming my sniper straight from there on Enrique Iglesias, 
Holy Jesus, 
His illogical songs reminds me of my dad, 
the one whom i dissed in almost every song i had, 
I even tried to Beastie boys and Jackson's Bad, 
But none i liked as much as i like
"If i had"

replies.message: Deepak bhai aag lgga di lyrics ne toh
He's writing about the woman he loves

Am I coming or going i can barely decide, I juss drank a fifth of vodka dare me to drive, I ain't had a woman in years and my palms are to hairy to hide, close rip like the incredible hulk, I spit wen I talk, I'll fuck anything that walks, wen I was little I used to get so hungry I would throw fits, how you gonna breast feed me mom you ain't got no tits.
Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
